name: eggd_pandora
title: eggd_pandora
summary: Takes patient and variant information and shares with online databases
whatsNew:
* 2.0.0 Updated to take data from a csv file and input to ClinVar
 * 2.0.1 bugfix for incorrect field name
 * 2.0.2 add NUH ACGS guidelines link

inputSpec.name: decipher_api_keys
inputSpec.label: DECIPHER API keys
inputSpec.help: JSON file containing DECIPHER client key and user key

inputSpec.name: opencga_config
inputSpec.label: OpenCGA configuration
inputSpec.help: JSON file containing username and password for OpenCGA API acess

inputSpec.name: opencga_case_id
inputSpec.label: OpenCGA case ID
inputSpec.help: OpenCGA case ID of the case to be uploaded to DECIPHER

inputSpec.name: opencga_study_name
inputSpec.label: OpenCGA study name
inputSpec.help: OpenCGA study containing the case to be uploaded to Decipher in the format user@project:study. Study and project can be specified using either name or UUID.

inputSpec.name: decipher_submitter_id
inputSpec.label: DECIPHER ID of submitter
inputSpec.help: The account_id of the DECIPHER user who is the responsible for the patient record

inputSpec.name: running_mode
inputSpec.label: Running mode to run eggd_pandora in

inputSpec.name: clinvar_testing
inputSpec.label: If true, will submit variants to test API endpoint, if false, will use live API endpoint

inputSpec.name: submission_ids_file
inputSpec.label: Submission IDs to query in ClinVar

inputSpec.name: variant_csv
inputSpec.label: A csv file with the variant data that is to be submitted to ClinVar

outputSpec.name: link_to_patient_in_decipher
outputSpec.label: Link to the patient record in DECIPHER
outputSpec.help: This url links to the patient record in DECIPHER that was created or updated by this run of eggd_pandora

outputSpec.name: clinvar_accession_id
outputSpec.label: Accession ID(s) for variants submitted to ClinVar
